# linregpkg

An S3 implementation of linear regression via QR decomposition.

## Installation

You can install the development version of linregpkg from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mohzh143/linregpkg")
```

## Example

```r
library(linregpkg)

# Fit model on iris dataset
fit <- linreg(Petal.Length ~ Sepal.Width + Sepal.Length, data = iris)

# Methods
print(fit)
coef(fit)
head(pred(fit))
head(resid(fit))
summary(fit)
plot(fit)
```
